department: Foreign Affairs, Trade And Development (Department Of)
short_summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for the procurement of Architectural & Engineering Services for the Detail Seismic Evaluation of the official residence for the Embassy of Canada to Jamaica.
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for the procurement of Architectural & Engineering Services for the Detail Seismic Evaluation of the official residence for the Embassy of Canada to Jamaica. \\
